ai.summary: A gentle 3.1 km hike around the Loch of Voe in the UK, ideal for beginners. The route offers coastal views, open skies, and a largely flat, grassy path with occasional rocky sections.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat to gently undulating coastal terrain. Mostly well-defined paths along the loch, with some grassy sections and small rocks; expect exposed winds and uneven ground near the shore.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather and tide conditions before you go. Wear layered waterproof clothing and sturdy footwear. The route runs along the shore and can be exposed to wind; keep a safe distance from cliff edges and be cautious on wet, slippery sections. Bring water and snacks, and tell someone your plan.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly April–October) typically offers milder weather and longer daylight; the hike can be done in winter with appropriate gear.

seo.title: Loch of Voe – Easy 3.1 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover an easy 3.1 km hike at the Loch of Voe in the UK. Gentle coastal terrain, scenic views, safety tips, and gear for a short day walk.
seo.h1: Loch of Voe – Easy 3.1 km Hike
